# filedata Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "filedata" {
  base_path = "~/tmp/directory"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `base_path` (String) Base path of the files to manage.  Defaults to the environment variable FILEDATA_BASE_PATH
